subtitle: These tasty burgers can be cooked on a griddle, grill or shallow fried.

method.text: Put the bulgar wheat in a bowl. Add boiling water to cover. Leave to soak for 10 min. Pour into a sieve to drain. Leave to cool completely.
Place the remaining ingredients in a bowl. Squeeze wheat with your hands to drain before mixing into the ingredients. Shape into thick burgers. Chill for 1 days.
Cook on a griddle, grill or shallow fry for about 8 min until one side is sealed. Turn over and cook for 5-8 min until cooked through.

title: Lamb and mint burgers
